attributes.action: allow a new and open inquest into the suspicious circumstances of Dr David Kelly's death.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Until an open and thorough inquest is done the question of Dr Kelly having been murdered by Blair's government will remain, as it seems the truth is being hidden. It is best for the nation that this matter is settled, regardless of the wishes of the few individuals involved.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
